title: "Skip waiting for stats" fetching stats for up to 10 minutes every 2 out of 3 games
body: This bug has been happening to me the entirety of this patch, 2 out of 3 matches i'll have to wait up to 10 minutes for the end results screen after a match. Not only is this extremely frustrating because i like to honor/report those deserving, but there's also no local fix on my machine - i've tried reinstalling the game to a new location, i've tried repairing the game files, i've tried it on several different accounts across multiple servers - the bug persists.

replies.body: You might have[ Close Client during Game](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) enabled, which can take a bit because your client is trying to relaunch.  Let me know if that was the cause!
I am afraid that's not the cause. The option is toggled off and i frequently open the client during loading screen to chat with friends. Are there any other potential configuration causes?

Thanks for the info!  Less likely configuration, but possibly a connection instability transition from the game server back to the client.  Try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tighten up your network a bit.

Thank you for the help, i will do that then. 

-edit- hopefully i'll find out what causes it on my end. I appreciate the attention!
